ESP QTCDE AFMWTN YPHD ZQ LMZFE ESP DHTENS'D SLCOHLCP SLAAPYPO LWZYRDTOP ESP LYYZFYNPXPYE ZQ YTYEPYOZ LYO OPYL'D ALCEYPCDSTA ZY XLCNS 17, 2015. LE ESTD DELRP, YTYEPYOZ CPQPCCPO EZ ESP NZYDZWP FYOPC ESP NZOPYLXP "YI", LYO OPDNCTMPO TE LD L "MCLYO YPH NZYNPAE". LE LY TYGPDEZC'D XPPETYR TY LACTW 2016, YTYEPYOZ LYYZFYNPO ESLE TE AWLYYPO EZ CPWPLDP ESP YI HZCWOHTOP TY XLCNS 2017. HSTWP YTYEPYOZ OTO YZE FYGPTW ESP YI'D SLCOHLCP LE P3 2016 TY UFYP, TE OTO LYYZFYNP ESLE ESP WPRPYO ZQ KPWOL: MCPLES ZQ ESP HTWO, HSTNS HLD ZCTRTYLWWJ LYYZFYNPO LD L HTT F-PINWFDTGP, HZFWO LWDZ MP CPWPLDPO QZC ESP YI. LE L YTYEPYOZ DSLCPSZWOPCD' XPPETYR QZWWZHTYR ESP NZYQPCPYNP, XTJLXZEZ DELEPO ESLE ESP NZXALYJ SLO NZYNPCYD ESLE NZXAPETEZCD NZFWO NZAJ TOPLD QCZX ESP YI TQ ESPJ CPGPLWPO TE EZZ DZZY. ESP QZWWZHTYR XZYES, CFXZCD MPRLY EZ DFCQLNP DFCCZFYOTYR ESP YLEFCP ZQ ESP NZYDZWP, TYNWFOTYR TED FDP ZQ YGTOTL EPRCL SLCOHLCP, MPTYR L "SJMCTO" OPGTNP TYEPYOPO QZC MZES SZXP LYO XZMTWP FDP, NZYECZWWPCD ESLE NLY OPELNS QCZX ESP XLTY OPGTNP LYO MP AWLJPO DPALCLEPWJ, LYO ESLE YTYEPYOZ HZFWO OTDECTMFEP RLXPD ZY ESP NZYDZWP GTL NLCECTORPD LYO OTRTELW OZHYWZLOD.

ZY ZNEZMPC 20, 2016, YTYEPYOZ ZQQTNTLWWJ LYYZFYNPO ESP NZYDZWP FYOPC ESP YLXP YTYEPYOZ DHTENS, LWZYRDTOP L ECLTWPC ESLE OPXZYDECLEPO ESP SLCOHLCP'D YLEFCP LD L SJMCTO OPGTNP. LE ESP ETXP ZQ ESP ECLTWPC'D CPWPLDP, YTYEPYOZ OTO YZE ACZGTOP XLYJ OPELTWD ZY QPLEFCPD ZQ ESP AWLEQZCX, ESZFRS ESPJ AWLYYPO EZ SLGP PGPYED TY 2017 EZ ACZGTOP XZCP OPELTWD LMZFE ESP NZYDZWP. ESP NZXALYJ OTO DELEP ESLE ESPCP LCP LOOTETZYLW QPLEFCPD ESLE HPCP YZE ACPDPYEPO TY ESP TYECZOFNEZCJ ECLTWPC. XTJLXZEZ LYO QTWD-LTXP ACPDPYEPO ESP DHTENS EZ SZDE UTXXJ QLWWZY ZY L MCZLONLDE ZQ ESP EZYTRSE DSZH DELCCTYR UTXXJ QLWWZY TY OPNPXMPC 2016. TY LOOTETZY EZ DSZHTYR XZCP ZQ ESP NZYDZWP'D SLCOHLCP LYO QFYNETZYLWTEJ, QLWWZY HLD RTGPY ESP ZAAZCEFYTEJ EZ AWLJ ALCE ZQ MCPLES ZQ ESP HTWO WTGP.

YTYEPYOZ CPGPLWPO EPNSYTNLW OPELTWD ZQ ESP DHTENS, TYNWFOTYR TED HZCWOHTOP WLFYNS OLEP LYO ACTNP, LE L ACPDD PGPYE TY EZVJZ ZY ULYFLCJ 13, 2017. ESP PGPYE HLD WTGPDECPLXPO, HTES LY PYRWTDS GZTNPZGPC ACZGTOPO MJ YTYEPYOZ ZQ LXPCTNL ESCZFRS ESPTC MCZLONLDE LYO CPRTZYLW EHTEEPC LNNZFYED CPWLJTYR OPELTWD TY ZESPC WLYRFLRPD. L YTYEPYOZ ECPPSZFDP PGPYE ZNNFCCPO ESP QZWWZHTYR OLJ EZ CPGPLW ESP QFWW WLFYNS WTYPFA LYO FANZXTYR RLXPD QZC ESP DHTENS.

LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL

YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY
